fields.label: Max File Size (bytes)
fields.description: Maximum file size allowed for uploads (10MB = 10485760 bytes)

fields.label: Allowed File Types
fields.description: Comma-separated list of allowed MIME types and extensions

fields.label: Default Room Max Members
fields.description: Default maximum number of members per chat room

fields.label: Enable Desktop Notifications
fields.description: Allow users to receive desktop notifications for new messages

fields.label: Auto Delete Old Messages

fields.description: Allow users to edit their sent messages

fields.label: Message Edit Time Limit (hours)
fields.description: Time limit for editing messages (in hours, 0 = no limit)

fields.label: Enable Message Reactions
fields.description: Allow users to react to messages with emojis

fields.label: Enable Typing Indicators
fields.description: Show typing indicators when users are typing
